Reeves, RDR-CRR (202) 354-3246. Transcript may be viewed at the court public terminal or purchased through the Transcriber before the deadline for Release of Transcript Restriction. After that date it may be obtained through PACER. The parties have seven (7) calendar days to file with the court a Motion Requesting Redactions or Corrections of this transcript. If no such motion is filed, the transcript may be made remotely electronically available to the public without redactions or corrections after Release of Transcript Restriction deadline of 3/17/2025.
